kw.name: SeleniumLibrary.Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given url.

kw.name: SeleniumLibrary.Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: SeleniumLibrary.Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

test.name: Users Can Create An Account And Log In

kw.name: OperatingSystem.Remove File
kw.doc: Removes a file with the given path.

kw.name: SeleniumLibrary.Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the active browser instance to the provided URL.

kw.doc: Navigates the active browser instance to the provided URL.

kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: password_keywords_resource.The accounts database should contain an active account fred/p@ssw0rd

kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.
kw.msg: ${db} = frank p@ssw0rd online fred p@ssw0rd active xyzfoobar p@ssw0rd active michael p@ssw0rd active

kw.name: BuiltIn.Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if `item1` does not contain `item2` one or more times.

kw.name: SeleniumLibrary.Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
